keyword: how many calories in snickers fun size
title: How Many Calories in a Snickers Fun Size?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in Snickers fun size bar, including carbs, sugars, fat, protein, and full nutrition breakdown per bar.
h1: How Many Calories in a Snickers Fun Size?
assumptions: Standard Snickers Fun Size bar (17 g), milk chocolate with nougat, caramel, and peanuts; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, size, and manufacturer; values based on average USDA data. Check packaging for exact info.

quick_answer.text: A Snickers Fun Size bar contains about 80 calories with 10 g carbs and 1 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Snickers Almond Fun Size (swap peanuts for almonds)
Half a fun size bar (portion control)
Frozen Snickers fun size (no calorie change, but texture variation)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Snickers fun size bar?
faqs.a: Approximately 80 calories per standard 17 g bar.

faqs.q: What are the carbs and sugars in Snickers fun size?
faqs.a: About 10 g total carbs, including 8.5 g sugars and 0.3 g fiber.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a Snickers fun size?
faqs.a: Roughly 4 g total fat, with 1.5 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Is Snickers fun size high in sodium?
faqs.a: It has about 45 mg sodium, which is moderate for a small treat.

faqs.q: How does Snickers fun size compare to full size?
faqs.a: Fun size is about 80 kcal; full size bar is around 250 kcal.
